name: DifficultButWeCan
description:
Hey guys,  I bring you a game of fishing, which is created by me fighting for 48 hours

~

After a year of depression, I want to give everyone some inspiration and strength through this simple game in this game jam.

Use the space dash to eat the yellow creatures, avoid the red creatures, continue to grow, and finally kill the purple mutant virus.

Hold on that we can win and break the virus!

(Action game players consciously press "2" after playing the game and enter the action mode

If you can't beat, please press "1"  to enter the simple mode)

今天给大家带来一个摸鱼的游戏,也是上班摸鱼做出来的~

经历了一年的压抑郁闷之后,想在这次gamejam中,通过这个简单的游戏给大家一些鼓舞和力量.

使用空格冲刺吃掉黄色的生, 躲避红色生物, 不断成长 最后把紫色的变异病毒干掉.

稳住我们能赢,打爆病毒吧!

(动作游戏玩家开游戏后自觉扣2, 进入动作模式

打不过请扣1进入简单模式 )
